Kent Godfrey

Web Developer

A passionate aspiring Web Designer & Developer based in the North of England looking for opportunities to develop my professional and technical skills in web.

My Resume

Get to know me.

I'm simply curious and creative. I have a burning passion for Web Development. Having just achieved a BSc (Hons) in Web Design and Development, I am now looking to continue my learning in the workplace. In my spare time, I take pleasure in designing and developing web pages and small applications that may come to good use in my personal life.

I am only human, so I do happen to have other interests. I'm an avid Chinese language learner having studied it for two years and studied abroad. To keep fit, I regularly play Table Tennis with a small society within the University of Central Lancashire. I am also a huge fan of learning how to cook difficult Chinese dishes from scratch.
